Title: Jonah Hex
Writer: Mark Neveldine (screenplay), Brian Taylor (screenplay), William Farmer (story), Mark Neveldine (story), Brian Taylor (story), John Albano (characters appearing in magazines published by DC Comics), Tony DeZuniga (characters appearing in magazines published by DC Comics)
Actors: Josh Brolin, John Malkovich, Megan Fox, Michael Fassbender
Plot: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.
